This page documents ''[[Minecraft]]'' feature and collaboration teasers published by [[Mojang Studios]] on various social media.

Teasers made by individual Mojang employees are not listed. Colored cells indicate that the exact meaning and/or status of the entry as a teaser is ambiguous.
